actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 96-944.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the report entitled "Progress in the Prevention and Control of Air Pollution in 1978 and 1979" as a Senate document.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of the annual report of the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency entitled, "Progress in the Prevention and Control of Air Pollution in 1978 and 1979" as a Senate document. Directs the additional printing of 500 copies of such document for use by the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the report entitled "Progress in the Prevention and Control of Air Pollution in 1978 and 1979" as a Senate document.
